title: An error occurred when installing pytorch from source
body_html:
I tried to install PyTorch from source, but i got an error as below. Can anyone help me?

[My environment]

Python 3.6 installed using anaconda

Cuda 8.0, V8.0.44

Linux version 3.10.0-514.6.1.el7.x86_64 (builder@kbuilder.dev.centos.org) (gcc version 4.8.5 20150623 (Red Hat 4.8.5-11) (GCC) )

nvcc error   : 'cicc' died due to signal 11 (Invalid memory reference)
nvcc error   : 'cicc' died due to signal 11 (Invalid memory reference)

nvcc error   : 'cicc' died due to signal 11 (Invalid memory reference)

nvcc error   : 'cicc' died due to signal 11 (Invalid memory reference)

  Error generating file
  /home1/irteam/users/yunjey/github/pytorch/torch/lib/build/THC/CMakeFiles/THC.dir/generated/./THC_generated_THCTensorMathCompareHalf.cu.o
